name: 4 Cats
description:
4 Cats is a thought-provoking, cute game about cats. This game may not be what it appears to be at first. This game makes you feel for the cats, and gives you, the player, a true motive to protect them.

This game was originally made for the AGBIC Jam, but took way too long. Hope you enjoy it!

You can play the game free - Just click "Download Now" - "No thanks, just take me to the downloads".
